content: on the road again by christina lundborg one size skill level easy materials yarn 1 skein chelsea luxe baby alpaca worsted 1 skein chelsea luxe mohair colorway used in sample chelsea luxe worsted baby alpaca apres ski & chelsea luxe mohair first snow note see page 4 for more information needles size 9 circular needles 16 long size 9 double-pointed needles dpns stitch glossary k1tbl= knit 1 stitch through the back loop k1 p1 rib even number of sts round 1 rs *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to end repeat round 1 for k1tbl p1 rib gauge 16 sts and 24 rnds = 4 over st st with size 9 needles and yarn held double check gauge for best results page 1 hat holding worsted and mohair together cast on 72 sts place marker and join in round work in k1tbl p1 rib until piece measures 3 from beg increase 16 stitches evenly throughout row you will now have 88 stitches total cont in st st knit every round until piece measures 8 from beginning of ribbing shape crown note change to dpns when there are too few sts on needle round 1 decrease *k6 k2tog repeat from * around round 2 and all following even rnds knit round 3 decrease *k5 k2tog repeat from * around round 5 decrease *k4 k2tog repeat from * around round 7 decrease *k3 k2tog repeat from * around round 9 decrease *k2tog repeat from * around cut tail pull through remaining sts page 2 finishing make a 4 pompom and secure to top of hat or use a fur pom pom with a snap hat also looks beautiful without a pom pom block for final touches measurements height 10 width 10 ribbing 8 thanks so much for downloading my pattern i hope you receive as much joy from knitting and wearing hats as i do xoxoxo page 3 note you can also add a strand of glitter or sparkle lurex which will not change or effect the gauge of your hat sample used a strand of kremke soul wool stellaris in silver 47% viscose 41% polyester 12% metallic yarn 560 meters/ 25 grams page 4
